languages.text: {n}Идира испуганно всхлипывает, но в следующую секунду обнимает вас в ответ.{/n} "Вот так так... совсем вы расклеились, а?" {n}Она молчит несколько секунд и прежде чем вас отпустить совсем тихо бормочет.{/n} "Спасибо".

{n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира испуганно всхлипывает, но в следующую секунду обнимает вас в ответ.{/n} "Вот так так... совсем вы расклеились, а?" {n}Она молчит несколько секунд и прежде чем вас отпустить совсем тихо бормочет.{/n} "Спасибо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You have really lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thank you."

{n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You have really lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thank you."

{n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

{n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

{n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉害怕地抽泣着，但随后也抱住了你。{/n}“你看，你看……你可真是有点上头了，对不对？”{n}她沉默了几秒钟，嘟囔了几句，之后才松开了手。{/n}“谢谢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉害怕地抽泣着，但随后也抱住了你。{/n}“你看，你看……你可真是有点上头了，对不对？”{n}她沉默了几秒钟，嘟囔了几句，之后才松开了手。{/n}“谢谢。”

languages.text: {n}Idira solloza con miedo, pero un momento más tarde te devuelve el abrazo.{/n} «Ea, ea... No puedes más, ¿verdad?». {n}Guarda silencio durante unos segundos y murmura una palabra antes de soltarte:{/n} «Gracias».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira solloza con miedo, pero un momento más tarde te devuelve el abrazo.{/n} «Ea, ea... No puedes más, ¿verdad?». {n}Guarda silencio durante unos segundos y murmura una palabra antes de soltarte:{/n} «Gracias».

languages.text: {n}イディラはひどくすすり泣いていた。だが、その次の瞬間、あなたを抱き返す。{/n}「よしよし…感情が抑えられなくなってしまったのね？」{n}彼女はしばらくの間沈黙する。そして、あなたから離れる前にぽつりとつぶやいた。{/n}「ありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはひどくすすり泣いていた。だが、その次の瞬間、あなたを抱き返す。{/n}「よしよし…感情が抑えられなくなってしまったのね？」{n}彼女はしばらくの間沈黙する。そして、あなたから離れる前にぽつりとつぶやいた。{/n}「ありがとう」

languages.text: {n}Idira schluchzt verängstigt, doch im nächsten Augenblick umarmt sie dich.{/n} "Ist ja gut, ist ja alles gut ... Da habt Ihr aber wirklich mal die Fassung verloren, was?" {n}Sie schweigt einige Sekunden lang und murmelt dann etwas, bevor sie dich loslässt.{/n} "Danke."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schluchzt verängstigt, doch im nächsten Augenblick umarmt sie dich.{/n} "Ist ja gut, ist ja alles gut ... Da habt Ihr aber wirklich mal die Fassung verloren, was?" {n}Sie schweigt einige Sekunden lang und murmelt dann etwas, bevor sie dich loslässt.{/n} "Danke."

languages.text: {n}Idira laisse échapper un sanglot craintif avant de vous rendre votre étreinte.{/n} « Là, là... Vous êtes complètement {mf|perdu|perdue}, hein ? » {n}Après quelques secondes de silence, elle marmonne quelque chose avant de vous relâcher.{/n} « Merci. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira laisse échapper un sanglot craintif avant de vous rendre votre étreinte.{/n} « Là, là... Vous êtes complètement {mf|perdu|perdue}, hein ? » {n}Après quelques secondes de silence, elle marmonne quelque chose avant de vous relâcher.{/n} « Merci. »

languages.text: {n}Korkuyla hıçkıran İdira, çok geçmeden sarılmana karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Geçti, geçti... Bir an kendini kaybettin, değil mi?" {n}Birkaç saniye sessiz kalıyor ve seni bırakmadan önce hafifçe fısıldıyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs fearfully, but in the next moment hugs you back.{/n} "There, there... You really have lost it, haven't you?" {n}She is silent for a few seconds and mutters something before letting you go.{/n} "Thanks."
